name: Cleaner promodj.com
description:
Removes distracting elements like branding.


Use with your favorite adblock to prevent AD popups.
additional_info:
8 January 2016:
* Cleans up right panel.

15 September 2015:
* Featured mixes can be hidden
* AD of mobile apps and tracks on the right (240x400 image) is hidden
* Removes footer AD

8 September 2015:
Initial Release
* Hides AD on the top of a website
* Hides background AD
